description: The Road Through 2024 continues for TheChirurgeon as he works on a new Renegade Raiders list, plus more hobby progress with his son.
title: TheChirurgeon’s Road Through 2024, Part 24: Finishing an Invictor Tactical Warsuit

description: If you’re a Star Wars mini gamer, chances are you’ve faced with having to paint a number of clonetroopers or stormtroopers. All that white armor can be intimidating, but we at Goonhammer are here to help. We’ve put together some different approaches in the hope that they will inspire you to get yours painted and […]
title: How to Paint Everything: Clonetroopers and Stormtroopers for Star Wars: Legion and Star Wars: Shatterpoint

description: Howdy all and welcome back to mech overview. This week we are looking at what is one of the more obscure mechs currently available in plastic, the Mercury! A mostly extinct design outside of the hands of Comstar and the Word of Blake, the Mercury is no one’s favorite but is canonically very important for […]
title: BattleTech: Mech Overview: Mercury

description: If you’re also a fan of The Old World then you may have seen the reference sheets I created for that already. Here’s the Age of Sigmar Fourth Edition version. Enjoy. Age of Sigmar’s fourth iteration of the game has been out for about a month at time of writing in that time I’ve seen […]
title: Age of Sigmar Fourth Edition Reference Sheets

description: The Unified Tournament Circuit is a regional circuit for Warhammer 40k and Age of Sigmar which covers the area between Virginia and Newfoundland. In case you missed our announcement, you can find it here. You can find the full calendar of UTC events here. This week we’re going to touch base on the weekly BCP […]
title: Kill Team UTC Weekend Recap and Preview: Jul 30 – Aug 05, 2024

description: We take a deep dive into the Da Big Hunt Detachment from Codex: Orks and talk about what's in it, how it works, and what a list using it looks like.
title: Detachment Focus: Da Big Hunt

description: We dive into a little bit of an older offering from one of our favourite historical miniatures companies this time around, with the Late Roman Legionaries (1): Lorica Hamata and Goth Warriors boxes from Wargames Atlantic. These make up so far the only kits in their Decline and Fall Range, and together they’re a strong contender for […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: Wargames Atlantic Late Roman Legionaries and Goth Warriors

description: This month sees the release of the long-awaited Shang-Chi and Silver Sable expansion box for Marvel: Crisis Protocol. We here at Goonhammer are fans of the model rules and Team Tactics Cards, (especially Shang-Chi) but we’re even bigger fans of playing it painted. Here’s how your reviewer approached painting these for the table. Silver Sable […]
title: How to Paint Everything: Shang-Chi and Silver Sable for Marvel Crisis Protocol
